verbs.description: rollover accident in bridgeport jams up route 8 traffic on route 8 southbound [V: was] jammed up monday afternoon due to a rollover accident near exit 2 according to the state department of transportation route 8 southbound was closed between exits 3 and 2 due to the crash reported at 1 57 p m dot traffic cameras showed that route 8 was still crammed with traffic by 2 30 p m bridgeport department of transportation rollover
